Upcoming Tests
Wednesday January 28th Topic 4 Test Climate
Monday  February 2nd Chapter 4 test Government, Landmarks and Symbols
Reading

Complete up to page 16 in the My View Workbook.

Read and complete the AR quizzes for your library book!

Complete the plot part for your literary fair book on the paper I gave you or your own paper of the same size.  (Monday). Please write this on some note paper for the teacher to check.

Please watch the video of this weeks story.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rGX67yYNsJk

Prepare for the spelling test next Friday

I will be giving grades for the readworks participation.  Please log in and complete the reading passages.

Please make sure students log in to ReadWorks and complete the assigned stories. New passages have been added, including one on the Titanic and another on the three branches of government, which link closely to our class learning.
Students should also read their library books and complete the AR quizzes once finished.

ReadWorks login:

www.readworks.org/student

Class code: YU6GQ2

Password: [REDACTED] (unless already changed)

Math

Complete Additional Practice 9-1 student book and homework book.

I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data.

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night
 at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.
